notes: Use these as the request body in Supabase Dashboard Cron for the Edge Function: media-embed-backfill.
If you set EMBED_BACKFILL_JOB_TOKEN in Edge Function env, also set request header X-Job-Token to the same value.
Set useSavedCursor=true so each provider has its own pagination cursor (jobName is derived from provider/model/dim/task/kind).
